nhc_headline: ...HEAVY RAINFALL, COASTAL FLOODING AND GUSTY WINDS EXPECTED ALONG THE COASTS OF TEXAS AND NORTHEASTERN MEXICO THROUGH THURSDAY...
summary:
...HEAVY RAINFALL, COASTAL FLOODING AND GUSTY WINDS EXPECTED ALONG THE COASTS OF TEXAS AND NORTHEASTERN MEXICO THROUGH THURSDAY...
 As of 7:00 PM CDT Tue Jun 18
 the center of One was located near 22.4, -92.8
 with movement NNW at 6 mph.
 The minimum central pressure was 999 mb
 with maximum sustained winds of about 40 mph.
